colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES BCA' YIG THUB BSTAN MDZES RGYAN GYI PHRA TSOM NOR BU CES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GDAN SA RAB BRTAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI PHYI RABS KYI GDUL BYA DANG BSTAN PA'I RGYUN DU PHAN SRID DAM SNYAM PA'I KHA CHEMS ^SA MI TI PAKSHI RGYAL KHANG RTZE RTA MGRIN BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, ,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
